description.black-white:
The user teleports using a strange power
and switches its place with one of
its allies.

effect.full: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
